description.@en: Most Halfling toddlers are given a precious keepsake to cherish. Typically, this is a bauble, cameo, necklace or ring – something Halflings can hold close to their hearts. This memento brings comfort and solace in the face of danger. However, other Halfling pickpockets may covet this treasure for themselves.

effect.@en: When carrying your memento, your Disorder’s effects may be temporarily ignored for 24 hours by spending a Fortune Point. In special cases, at the GM’s discretion, it may be given to another to confer its benefits.
